caption: The photograph captures a young mule deer fawn nestled among wildflowers and tall grasses, emphasizing a natural and tranquil setting. The fawn, positioned centrally in the frame, is mostly in focus, contrasting with the softly blurred foreground and background. Its large, alert ears and gentle eyes are prominent, evoking a sense of curiosity and alertness. The surrounding vegetation includes various types of flowers and plants, with colors ranging from green to bright yellow, adding vibrancy and depth to the scene. The warm sunlight seems to bathe the scene, highlighting the fawn's speckled coat and the subtle hues of the flora around it. This image encapsulates a peaceful moment in nature, showcasing the beauty and innocence of wildlife in its natural habitat.
title: Two-week old fawn was orphaned when its mother was killed by an autoMobile.  It is being cared for by workers at the balarat nature center in the rocky mountain foothills
